Maritime surveillance 66 Cruise the East China Sea day recon

In the afternoon of February 18, monitoring the East China Sea, China Sea Corps66 ships and 49 ship received the order, Shenjiamen pier from Zhoushan City,Zhejiang Province, to Louboutin Outlet the East China Sea waters under the jurisdiction of Chunxiao oil field in the vicinity of Cheap Christian Louboutin the Joint Development Zone regularly Rights cruiseenforcementactions.At 6:20 p.m. on the February 19th, is the China sea areas under the jurisdiction ofthe implementation of Christian Louboutin Outlet the 66 boats for maritime surveillance patrol in from the East China Sea Chunxiao oil and gas fields about 20 miles east of the suspicious vessel is a called "SHOYO, the low-speed navigation and in operating a restricted state, the vessel in Chinese waters under the jurisdiction of the suspected ongoing surveyoperations. 66 ocean surveillance ship immediately at or near the ship (a distanceof about 0.3 nautical miles), and further confirm its dynamic.At that time, the sky dark, the target vessel can not image forensics command groups on board instructed law enforcement officials immediately shouted to thetarget ship and asked about their dynamic.Law enforcement officers learned upon inquiry, confirmed that the ship is attachedto the Japan Coast Guard research vessel "Akihiro", are conducting investigations.Law enforcement officers then informed the ship, here is China's jurisdictional waters, the Chinese government permission to Christian Louboutin Men conduct survey operations. Law enforcement officers on several occasions to the solemn statement of the ship, according to relevant laws and regulations of the United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea and Exclusive Economic Zone and Continental Shelf, withoutChinese government approval is illegal, unauthorized operations in this sea area, requiring "Akihiro" immediately cease operations.

Taiwan intends to purchase the eight submarines to deal with

U.S. Washington Post, February 22, the Navy plans to Christian Louboutin Outlet purchase eight submarines,deal with the mainland's large submarine fleet. Allegedly, the three countries will be bidding for the deal, but Taiwan did not disclose specific information.According to the joint reported in Taiwan, the Taiwan legislature, required twomonths to Cheap Christian Louboutin approve the the submarines budget. Mainland China People's Liberation Army has a strong and balanced surface and submarine forces, Taiwan's navy naval forces, the lack of balance.Reported that the PLA navy has more than 60 submarines, including four activeballistic missile submarines and six nuclear attack submarines and dozens of Christian Louboutin Flats shipsconventional attack submarines. In contrast, Taiwan has only two outdatedDutch-made ??"Dragon" class conventional submarines in service, and two US-madeWorld War II, "Sea Lion" class submarine as a backup. Taiwan region is still heavily dependent on the United States to provide appropriate defensive weapon.However, the procurement of Christian Louboutin Men new submarines for the successive governments are a problem, and in 2001, past the various arms sale plan do not include submarines. In2001, newly elected U.S. President George W. Bush approved the sale of eightconventional submarines to Taiwan, to balance the continent's growing submarine force.

Facing a systemic crisis of European

China has over one trillion U.S. dollars of foreign exchange reserves are often the outside world that China has the ability of Europe to Louboutin Outlet shake off the main basis of thedebt crisis. In fact, over one trillion foreign exchange reserves, the vast majority have already purchased government bonds of the United States, Europe and some other countries. European total GDP of Christian Louboutin Outlet $ 16 trillion, more than double that of China, per capita income is six times more than China. Europe's per capita wealth, the citizensenjoy a variety of social welfare of the Chinese people can not be compared. China still has 200 million population live below the international poverty line. Therefore, we must not overestimate the ability of the Chinese assistance to Christian Louboutin Boots Europe: the Europeanassistance is not without official assistance.Recurring items in the external balance of payments account surplus holdings ofEuropean bonds, for example, to Christian Louboutin Men buy bonds issued by European financial stabilitymechanism to provide more funds for IMF assistance to European programs.However, in providing assistance at the same time, China should be required to expand to open up their trade and investment market, open on the technical aspectsof China's export restrictions in Europe. This is in line with international practice. Inthe past 30 years, whenever developing countries, debt and economic crisis needto receive IMF assistance program, one of the conditions proposed by developed countries is required to recipient countries to further open their markets.

Rely on innovation-driven or investment-driven

If each country's economic growth process is divided into multiple stages, then, indifferent stages of the factors that will stimulate economic growth, but can always find a major, such as a large number of Christian Louboutin Shoes cheap labor, FDI, large-scale infrastructure constructionscientific and technological progress, and many other factors one of them. "Competitive Strategy" father of today's global business managementacknowledged Michael Porter (Michael E.Porter), competition between countries to Christian Louboutin Men promote economic development is divided into four phases: the factors of production-driven, investment driven, innovation-driven, and the rich driver. The first three phases of economic growth stage, rich driver stage means that the state has come to the recession phase.In his view, the United Kingdom in the first half of the 19th century has entered theinnovation-driven stage, the United States, Germany, Sweden in the early 20th century into the innovation-driven stage, Japan, Italy in the late 1970s into theinnovation-driven stage, South Korea in the early 2000s into the innovation-drivenstage. A country in an innovation-driven stage of Christian Louboutin Outlet the main features are as follows:companies are increasingly less dependent on factors of production and the formation of Christian Louboutin Flats competitive advantage; many companies to overcome the cost of production or the impact of exchange rate changes; the emergence of large-scaleoverseas investment surges; industry cluster to vertical deepening or horizontalcross-sectoral development; government inaction.
